sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>concave</radical> radical and the <kanji>concave</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: If you call someone <kanji>concave</kanji> the <ja><reading>王</reading></ja> (<ja>おう</ja>) will find out and he'll have his guards turn you concave.
readingInfo: Watch your mouth around the <ja>王</ja>. Have you ever seen a concave person? Yeah that's because they didn't live through it. <ja>王</ja>s aren't very nice, you know.
